nodes.text: Sith Attack was a children's storybook published by Scholastic in February 2000 as part of the Star Wars Junior book series.
Darth Maul is an evil Sith apprentice. He gets his power from the dark side of the Force. The Sith have plan that will put the galaxy in danger.

Darth Maul prepares to reveal the presence of the Sith. He has been ordered by his Sith Master Palpatine to capture Queen Amidala. Maul tracks her and her Jedi protectors to Tatooine. He lands his ship and dispatches probe droids. Once the probes find the Jedi, Maul gives chase in his speeder. Maul then duels Qui-Gon Jinn, and almost defeats him. However the Jedi manages to escape aboad the Queen's starship. Maul vows not to let them get away.
